titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent law the penalty-free distributions from retirement plans to individuals called to active duty.
America's Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2007
America's Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: America's Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exemption from tax penalties for premature withdrawals from retirement plans made by individuals called to active duty in the Armed Forces.
